Direct Known Subclasses:
APDUToolTask, CapgenTask, ConverterTask, Exp2TextTask, MaskgenTask, ScriptgenTask, VerifierTask
public abstract class JavacardTaskBase
extends org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Java

This class serves as the base class for all Java Card ant tasks
